name: Futuristic Prison eScape
description:
Escape from your prison, destroy the guard robots and solve some puzzles. 

This time I had to use preexisting 3d models and animations, and tried to create not just basic FPS gameplay but add some puzzle elements as well.
Please enjoy

Features 

  • Basic FPS controls(WASD/arrow keys) + I key to open the inventory
  • 2 weapons (1 and 2 key buttons to change it)
  • 2 levels
  • Text in Spanish
